Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the segregated confinement of inmates with serious mental illness
Summary: Relates to the segregated confinement of inmates with serious mental illness.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to limiting the segregated confinement of persons in a correctional facility with serious mental illness
